name: Home Theater Experts Lakeland Winter Haven Florida
tag_list: home-theater, home-automation, energy-management, computer-networking, lighting-control, multi-room-audio-video, security-systems, camera-surveillance-systems
overview:
Since 94 has designed & installed World Class Systems throughout Florida and earning the reputation as the premiere design & installation firm.

With over a decade in business, SoundWaves has the knowledge and experience to guide you through the process of integrating cutting edge technologies into your home or business.

They serve as the consultant, and system integrator helping you make lifestyle choices based on your needs and budget.

Their diverse capabilities and our ongoing commitment to training and certification programs insure that you receive the best advice and systems available.

The products they provide represent the state of the art in their respective areas.

They service the central Florida area that includes Lakeland, Winter Haven, Tampa, Orlando, and any surrounding areas.

From their experienced design staff to their CEDIA certified technicians they invite you to give them a call for a free consultation and start planning the system of your dreams.

Certifications & Qualifications: THX Theater Design Level l & ll Certified ISF Video Certified HAA Audio Certified CEDIA Design & Installation Level l & ll Certified

Specialize In: Home Theater, Home Automation, Energy Management, Computer Networking, Lighting Control, Multi-Room Audio Video, Security & Camera Surveillance
